item.description:
Anyone interested in an evening of miniature golf?

Atlantic Golf Center is located just over the border in Attleboro, MA (exit 2B off interstate 95)

"18 Holes of exciting and challenging mini-golf offers a fun filled experience for the whole family. White Water Challenge is a state of the art mini-golf course with beautiful landscape and flowing water falls. Whether it's a Friday night date or a Sunday afternoon with the family, White Water Challenge at Atlantic Golf Center is a blast..."

There are several restaurants/ice cream stands nearby where we can go afterwards.
item.name: Miniature Golf in Attleboro
